name: SchXXXsrc
short_description:
This object will search every member of every source file of specified language type for the specified string.  
I.E. call SchXXXSrc parm('TEST' 'CBL') will search every QCBLSRC file on the system for members with the string 'TEST' in them.  (Case insensitive.)  All members with the string will be listed in a spool file.

(Put SQL text in a source file named QSQLSRC somewhere where it can be found by the program.)
summary: Search multiple source files on i-Series
